entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a character who wants to kill Cedric and is described as having red eyes and a smile.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is introduced as a person that Harry tries to grab onto while falling, but he is too heavy for Harry to carry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to grab onto Cedric and is using magic to try and get the Triwizard Cup.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is a magical object that Harry uses his wand to summon with the spell 'Accio'.

relationships.description: Voldemort wants to kill Cedric, as stated in his scream of fury when Harry takes the cup.
Harry uses his wand to summon the Triwizard Cup with the spell 'Accio'.
Voldemort is trying to kill Harry, as stated in his scream of fury when Harry takes the cup.
